channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #197, including every tabletop rpg project started between 05/15 and 06/12
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #197, including every tabletop rpg project started between 05/15 and 06/12. Following a big break the collection is back and covers almost a whole month. I haven’t made any smaller collections and thus don’t know which projects ended. Though thanks to a nice reader (Banjo the Clown) I’ll got a list to include itch.io fundings from now on. item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #197, including every tabletop rpg project started between 05/15 and 06/12
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #197, including every tabletop rpg project started between 05/15 and 06/12.

Following a big break the collection is back and covers almost a whole month. I haven’t made any smaller collections and thus don’t know which projects ended.
Though thanks to a nice reader (Banjo the Clown) I’ll got a list to include itch.io fundings from now on.

English Crowdfundings

4 Roleplaying Games
4 Fantasy Roleplaying Games
2 Post-Apocalyptic Roleplaying Games
3 Sentai & Superhero Roleplaying Games
3 Urban Action Roleplaying Games
1 2-Player Roleplaying Game
1 Solo Roleplaying Game
1 Gamebook
4 Settings
4 D&D 5E Settings
3 Sourcebooks
7 Systemspezische Sourcebooks
8 D&D 5E Sourcebooks
2 D&D 5E LGBT+ Sourcebooks
2 D&D 5E Bestiary Sourcebooks
3 Adventures
2 DCC/MCC Adventures
2 OSR(IC) Adventures
9 D&D 5E Adventures
9 Dice Projects
2 D6 Dice Projects
4 Accessoires
1 Deck of Cards
3 Software Projects
1 Actual Play
2 Enamel Pins
2 Token Projects
5 Various RPG Projects

Spanish Crowdfundings

3 Roleplaying Games
1 Solo Roleplaying Game
1 Adventures

French Crowdfundings

3 Roleplaying Games
2 Roleplaying Game Translations
1 Sourcebook
2 Adventures
2 Actual Plays

Swedish Crowdfundings

1 Sourcebook

Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/06/12/crowdfunding-collection-197/
